contentrichtext.text: {{no footnotes|date=February 2013}} [[Samoa]] has no formal defense structure or regular armed forces; informal defense ties exist with [[New Zealand]], which is required to consider any Samoan request for assistance under the 1962 Treaty of Friendship. ==External links== * [http://www.samoaobserver.ws/news/local/ln1104/0511ln008.htm Nafanua off for $5.5m refit in Townsville] [[Category:Military by country|Samoa]] [[Category:Government of Samoa]] {{mil-stub}}
